title: Web Development
text: HTML, CSS(Bootstrap), JavaScript(MERN Stack), Gatsby, and Firebase. You name it. I have it all covered!

title: Responsive Design
text: In 2020, you can't go online without having a mobile responsive website. Let me take care of that for you!

title: PSD to HTML
text: If you already have a design in Photoshop, InVision or any other format, I can covert it from scratch into a pixel-perfect, SEO-friendly HTML/CSS/JS website using the latest frameworks and technologies.
